description: This file defines the FilterProvider class, which manages filter criteria state for a Flutter application. It exposes methods to update filter settings such as hair color, race, religion, height range, and weight range, and notifies listeners on changes.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages filter criteria, allowing updates and notifying listeners.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Replaces the current filter criteria with the provided value and notifies listeners.

methods.name: toggleHairColor
methods.description: Adds or removes a HairColor from the filter criteria's hairColors set based on the selected flag.

methods.name: toggleRace
methods.description: Adds or removes a Race from the filter criteria's races set based on the selected flag.

methods.name: toggleReligion
methods.description: Adds or removes a Religion from the filter criteria's religions set based on the selected flag.

methods.name: updateHeightRange
methods.description: Updates the heightRange in filter criteria with a new Range.

methods.name: updateWeightRange
methods.description: Updates the weightRange in filter criteria with a new Range.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the filter criteria to default values.
